Title: Relates to enacting the "Gender Recognition Act"; and repealing subdivision 1 of section 502 of the vehicle and traffic law relating to driver's licenses; repealer
Summary: Enacts the "Gender Recognition Act"; repeals certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law relating to driver's licenses.
LawCode: Amd §§63, 64 & 64-a, add Art 6-A §§67 - 67-b, Civ Rts L; rpld §502 sub 1, amd §§490 & 502, V & T L; amd §§4132 & 4138, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, the vehicle and traffic law and the public health law, in relation to enacting the "Gender Recognition Act"; and to repeal subdivision 1 of section 502 of the vehicle and traffic law relating to driver's licenses
